thread.title: BRIEF-Cedar Realty Trust Announces Agreement With Snow Park Capital Partners

title: BRIEF-Cedar Realty Trust Announces Agreement With Snow Park Capital Partners

organizations.name: snow park capital partners reuters staff

text: February 16, 2018 / 2:06 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Cedar Realty Trust Announces Agreement With Snow Park Capital Partners Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Cedar Realty Trust Inc: * CEDAR REALTY TRUST ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT WITH SNOW PARK CAPITAL PARTNERS * CEDAR REALTY TRUST - ‍CO‘S NOMINATING/CORPORATE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE TO ENGAGE SEARCH FIRM TO IDENTIFY NEW INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR CANDIDATE TO STAND FOR ELECTION * CEDAR REALTY TRUST INC - ‍SNOW PARK CAPITAL PARTNERS, LP BENEFICIALLY OWNS ABOUT 3.9 PERCENT OF CEDAR‘S OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
